scripts.install: cp -r node_modules/bootstrap node_modules/bootstrap-table node_modules/@fortawesome node_modules/jquery node_modules/luxon/build/global/luxon.min.js assets/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap _sass/ && rougify style igorpro > _sass/rouge.scss
scripts.preinstall: rm -rf assets/bootstrap assets/bootstrap-table assets/@fortawesome assets/jquery assets/luxon.min.js _sass/rouge.scss
